product_name: SmartWool Adventure Crew Socks - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The classic casual SmartWool Adventure Crew Socks have hits of color on the tops for rugged sophistication while you trek around town. WOW(TM) (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in the heel and forefoot area, improving durability and overall comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The classic casual SmartWool Adventure Crew Socks have hits of color on the tops for rugged sophistication while you trek around town.
